column5: Have gone on a few fly in trips and never had a finder, I see GPS ones out there. Is gps the way to go or buy a Humminbird or Lowrance head unit with transducer and make it portable?
Ugh just saw another post for this, Please Delete

Ive got a lowrance hook 7 that i use for flyouts and when i guide in camp boats.i bought a aluminum adjustable bracket that clamps on to most boats works excellent and for winter i have a ice transducer and keep it in a smaller cabelas bag.
